sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './FeaturesSection.css'; import orb from './orb.png'; import group16 from './Group 16.png'; import Smartphone from './Smartphone RAM.png'; import Sparkling from './Sparkling.png'; import Care from './Care.png'; import Friends from './Friends.png'; import Audio from './Audio Wave.png'; const FeaturesSection = () => (
  • 01 Personalized Self-Care
  • 02 Emotionally Intelligent AI Companion
  • 03 Gentle, Human-Like Experience
  • 04 Memory-Powered Conversations
  • 05 Voice Chat Support
); export default FeaturesSection;
